entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
